email.subject: Good Job!
email.body:
Good job #PLAYERNAME#!
That's another win! You're really starting to show some promise in this competition! If you keep this up you'll be well on your way to the team battle rounds.
Be careful though, save a trick or two for the bigger opponents won't you.
Whilst you wait for the next match, why don't you take another look at the News and Forum, there's some new information there.
- Eleanor Hammond
Hacker Wars Assistant assigned to: #PLAYERNAME#
